scripts.lint: go vet ./... && go fmt ./... && golangci-lint run --no-config --timeout=5m ./...
scripts.lint:fix: go vet ./... && go fmt ./... && golangci-lint run --no-config --timeout=5m --fix ./...
scripts.test:ci: mkdir -p test-output && go test -coverprofile=test-output/cover.out -json ./... | tee test-output/test-report.json
scripts.test:html: mkdir -p test-output && go test -coverprofile=test-output/cover.out ./... && go tool cover -html=test-output/cover.out -o test-output/coverage.html
